description:
No sooner had Sota met Inami than she punched him in the face. He soon learns that Inami has a habit of reflexively punching men on sight. Kyoko orders them to break the ice and help each other out with their respective personality flaws.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inami, Dansei Kyoufushou. Datte Kowain da mon...
Inami, the Androphobic, Because... She`s Scared!
伊波, 男性恐怖症. だって怖いんだもん...
